#summary This is the Example 4 using the JBioWH Webservices

= Identify all human genes which are linked to asthma drugs using the JBioWH Webservices =

The Java Code for this example is [http://jbiowh.googlecode.com/svn/jbiowh-tools/src/main/java/org/jbiowhtools/examples/FindGenefromDrugUsingWebServices.java here]

Go to a CMD Windows console or a linux console to execute the java code: 

<code language="bash">
java -cp <path-to the-jbiowhtool-jar-file> org.jbiowhtools.examples.FindGenefromDrugUsingWebServices -v
</code>

The obtained gene number is the same that in the others methods.
